Class WorkspaceController

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.warwick.dcs.sherlock.module.web.controllers.dashboard.workspace.WorkspaceController

public class WorkspaceController
extends java.lang.Object
    The controller that deals with the manage workspace pages

      • detailsGetFragment

        @GetMapping(value="/dashboard/workspaces/manage/{pathid}/details")
public java.lang.String detailsGetFragment(@PathVariable(value="pathid")
                                                                                                              long pathid,
                                                                                                              @ModelAttribute(value="workspace")
                                                                                                              WorkspaceWrapper workspaceWrapper,
                                                                                                              @ModelAttribute(value="isAjax")
                                                                                                              boolean isAjax,
                                                                                                              org.springframework.ui.Model model)
                                                                                                       throws NotAjaxRequest
        Handles the GET request to the workspace details fragment
        Parameters:
        pathid - the id of the workspace
        workspaceWrapper - the workspace being managed
        isAjax - whether or not the request was ajax or not
        model - holder for model attributes
        Returns:
        the path to the workspace details fragment
        Throws:
        NotAjaxRequest - if the request was not an ajax one, the message is where to redirect the user to

      • detailsPostFragment

        @PostMapping(value="/dashboard/workspaces/manage/{pathid}/details")
public java.lang.String detailsPostFragment(@PathVariable(value="pathid")
                                                                                                                long pathid,
                                                                                                                @ModelAttribute(value="workspace")
                                                                                                                WorkspaceWrapper workspaceWrapper,
                                                                                                                @ModelAttribute(value="isAjax")
                                                                                                                boolean isAjax,
                                                                                                                @Valid @ModelAttribute
                                                                                                                @Valid WorkspaceForm workspaceForm,
                                                                                                                org.springframework.validation.BindingResult result,
                                                                                                                org.springframework.ui.Model model)
                                                                                                         throws NotAjaxRequest
        Handles POST requests to the workspace details fragment
        Parameters:
        pathid - the id of the workspace
        workspaceWrapper - the workspace being managed
        isAjax - whether or not the request was ajax or not
        workspaceForm - the form that should be submitted in the request
        result - the results of the validation on the form above
        model - holder for model attributes
        Returns:
        the path to the details fragment template
        Throws:
        NotAjaxRequest - if the request was not an ajax one, the message is where to redirect the user to

                                                                                               throws NotAjaxRequest
        Handles GET requests to the run analysis fragment
        Parameters:
        pathid - the id of the workspace
        workspaceWrapper - the workspace being managed
        account - the account of the current user
        isAjax - whether or not the request was ajax or not
        model - holder for model attributes
        Returns:
        the path to the run template
        Throws:
        NotAjaxRequest - if the request was not an ajax one, the message is where to redirect the user to

      • runPostFragment

        @PostMapping(value="/dashboard/workspaces/manage/{pathid}/run")
public java.lang.String runPostFragment(@PathVariable(value="pathid")
                                                                                                        long pathid,
                                                                                                        @RequestParam(value="template_id",required=true)
                                                                                                        long template_id,
                                                                                                        @ModelAttribute(value="workspace")
                                                                                                        WorkspaceWrapper workspaceWrapper,
                                                                                                        @ModelAttribute(value="account")
                                                                                                        AccountWrapper account,
                                                                                                        @ModelAttribute(value="isAjax")
                                                                                                        boolean isAjax,
                                                                                                        org.springframework.ui.Model model)
                                                                                                 throws NotAjaxRequest,
                                                                                                        TemplateNotFound
        Handles POST requests to the run analysis fragment
        Parameters:
        pathid - the id of the workspace
        template_id - the id of the template to run
        workspaceWrapper - the workspace being managed
        account - the account of the current user
        isAjax - whether or not the request was ajax or not
        model - holder for model attributes
        Returns:
        the path to the run template
        Throws:
        NotAjaxRequest - if the request was not an ajax one, the message is where to redirect the user to
        TemplateNotFound - if the template was not found

      • getWorkspaceWrapper

        @ModelAttribute(value="workspace")
private WorkspaceWrapper getWorkspaceWrapper(@ModelAttribute(value="account")
                                                                                AccountWrapper account,
                                                                                @PathVariable(value="pathid")
                                                                                long pathid,
                                                                                org.springframework.ui.Model model)
                                                                         throws IWorkspaceNotFound,
                                                                                WorkspaceNotFound
        Gets the workspace where the id equals the "pathid" path variable
        Parameters:
        account - the account of the current user
        pathid - the workspace id
        model - holder for model attributes
        Returns:
        the workspace wrapper
        Throws:
        IWorkspaceNotFound - if the workspace was not found in the Engine database
        WorkspaceNotFound - if the workspace was not found in the web database
